Description: A: flattened spherical bead made of a glassy material in a light blue to grey colour with dark blue inclusions. B: extended spherical bead with an edge running around the body, made of light blue faience.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.9, room E
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
